bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition identical with shan na 閃肭 , sprain. Ri hua zi zhu jia ben cao 日華子諸家本草 Substance Entry shi yin chen 石茵陳：治天 行時疾熱狂，頭痛頭旋，風眼疼，瘴瘧。女人癥瘕，並閃損乏絕 , “It cures heaven-sent seasonal ailments, heat madness, headache and dizziness, wind eye pain, miasmatic malaria, concretion-illness and conglomeration-illness of females, as well as a sprain injury with extreme exhaustion”.
